item.description:
Good morning Packers,

This week we are home to Minnesota on Monday night football with a kick off time of 8.20pm, I would like to thank all of you that turned up last Sunday in was an incredible crowd hopefully each week can get bigger going forward. The last couple of years we have not got the biggest crowds for the Monday night games so based on the turn out we may move the game to the 1st floor, please let me know what you think……..if we get a decent crowd we will have no problem opening the 2nd floor. Enjoy your Sunday and I hope to see you tomorrow night, GO PACK.

Best,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: GREEN BAY v minnesota
